All Classes

Class Description
ApprovedType
this class is just useless.
ChatPageController
this class loads the page of a user chatting with another user.
Client
This class provides socket and streams for connecting to the server and nothing more!
ClientHandler
this class is a thread and its run method is started each time a user connects to the server and input and output streams are set in order to send and receive data.
CommandSender
this class acts like a holder for the information needed to be sent to the server and to be received from it.
CommandType
this enum class helps the server recognize the sent order so that it can behave correctly.
Comment
this class is for comments and saving the information of one comment at a time.
CommentItem
this class assigns the graphic to a cell of the comments list.
CommentItemController
this class sets the information for each cell of the comments' list.
CommentPageController
this Class controls the page which the comments are shown.
DataBase
this is the class where everything is saved and sent to the client side in order to synchronize the client with the server.
ItemController
the mother of all the itemControllers which must implement the init method.
Log
this class is just for printing the events which happen during the server runtime.
LoginController
this class is for the page which the user logs in from it.
Main
SBUgram
MainMenuController
from the page of this controller the user can access almost everything.
mainPage
the mother of all the pages which have the radioButtons at the bottom.
MainPageController
this controller is for the page which shows the timeLine.
Message
the item for every chat with another user
MyProfileController
this class is for loading the page of the user itself this page shows the timeline of the posts of the user and shows users' personal info.
NewPostPageController
this controller is for the page which allows user to post it's new post.
PageLoader
actually, i only used this class for the items and that's it.
PasswordRetrieveController
this class and its page allows user to retrieve his/her password using the security question.
PicMessage
this class is for creating a message which contains a pic ,too.
Post
this class is for posts and saving the information of one post at a time.
PostItem
this class assigns the graphic to a cell of the posts list.
PostItemController
this class sets the information for each cell of the posts' list.
ProfilePageController
one of the most important classes which controls the profilePages which the user wants to see.
ReversedMessage
the graphic which we see when we receive a message.
ReversedPicMessage
this class is for creating a message which contains a pic ,too (but for the addressed user).
SearchChatController
this class is similar to the SearchPageController but it checks if the searched user for chatting is available or not due to the blocking.
SearchPageController
SearchPageController
SecurityQuestion
this class is a holder for the question and the answer of a security question.
Server
Server class doesn't do anything except accepting users and initializing the server and connecting to the database.
SettingPageController  
SignupController
Signup in SBUgram! This controller handles all the occurrences in the signup menu.
TextItem
this class assigns the graphic to a cell of the Texts list.
TextItemController
this class is for controlling the items of chats.
thisUser
This class holds two static fields.
User
this class holds everything needed for a new profile.
UserList
a class for giving graphic to the list of users whom the main user has chatted with.
UserListItem
this class assigns the graphic to a cell of the User list.
UserListItemController
this class helps to control the items of users available for chatting
UserListPageController
